summary: Diff adds a single-page marketing site composed of Home/About/Courses/Contact sections with header/footer, sticky WhatsApp button, contact form submission to a Motoko backend, and basic runtime SEO/meta updates. Several core backend/data requirements are incomplete or incorrect (stable persistence, validation, exact business info), and the backend includes extra inquiry-retrieval endpoints not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the exact provided business information (address and phone/WhatsApp details) in the Contact section.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend shows a Kolkata address/phone, but the backend `getContactInfo()` returns a different phone number and a Berlin address, so the system does not consistently use the exact provided business information.

missing_requirements.requirement: Persist contact inquiries in stable storage so they survive canister upgrades.
missing_requirements.reason: Backend stores inquiries in an in-memory `List` with no stable variables or pre/post-upgrade hooks shown, so inquiries would not survive upgrades.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend validates required fields (at minimum: name, phone, message) and returns clear error responses for invalid input.
missing_requirements.reason: `submitContactForm` accepts values and always appends a record; no validation checks or explicit error returns are implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend endpoints to list and fetch stored inquiries (`getSortedContactInquiries` and `getContactInquiryByTimestamp`).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for canister methods to create/store inquiries and allow frontend submission; it does not request admin/query endpoints for retrieving inquiries.
BuildRequest specifies the Contact section should display exact business info, but does not request a backend API for serving that info.
